info.title: Azure Migrate Engine APIs
info.description: A first party Azure service for modernizing workloads.

get.description: Lists all the available API operations under this PR

default.description: Resource provider error response about the failure.

get.description: Gets the details of the deployed resource.
Gets the list of deployed resources in the given modernizeProject.
Gets the details of the modernizeProject agent.

parameters.description: Continuation token from the previous call.

get.description: Gets the statistics for the modernizeProject.
Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the modernizeProject.
Gets the details of the job.

Tracks the results of an asynchronous operation on the job.
Gets the details of the workload deployment.

parameters.name: forceDelete
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to do force delete or not.

get.description: Gets the list of workload deployments in the given modernizeProject.

Performs the build container image action on the workload deployment.

TargetStorageProfile.description: Storage profile for the directory on the target container.

storageAccessType.description: Gets or sets the target storage access type.

storageProjectionType.description: Gets or sets the target projection type.

hydrationStorageProviderType.description:
Gets or sets the storage provider type on the target.
Applicable when StorageProjectionType is not ContainerFileSystem.

persistentVolumeId.description:
Gets or sets the target persistent volume id.
Applicable when StorageProjectionType is PersistentVolume and on using an
existing PersistentVolume.

targetName.description: Gets or sets the name of the projected volume on the target environment.

targetSize.description:
Gets or sets the storage size on the target.
Applicable when StorageProjectionType is PersistentVolume and on creating a new
PersistentVolume.
